WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I would be interested in a sample of WCF 4 routing which demonstrates the following scenarios:
 
- fallback (one address is not available, try another)
- multiple message recipients
- decision of recipient based on a rule
 
Thanks, and keep up the excellent work!
RP

Comments.Message:

Well, I wasn't thinking of WIF, just plain WCF routing, but if you decide to combine both requests, it's fine by me.
Regards,
